content.detailedDescription: This is mainly in responce to the report of a "lightless" object over ou campus around 10pm 4/25/2012. i was leaving a well known "center" near (within 2 miles) of campus around (guesstimating) 10:20 pm wed nt. i say guesstimating then because i got home at 10:40pm and it's usually a 20 min drive to and from. so it must've been around ~10:20pm or so. unlike what you described, the only reason i even noticed this was because it was so bright and extremely low to me, and seemed awfully quiet and stationary to be an airplane. if it was a star i sure as heck didn't notice it before tonight. anyway, when i pulled out of the parking lot onto the road i didn't notice it anymore, so i kind of wondered where it went or what it was. i didn't really have aliens on my mind then, but i wondered and briefly thought, maybe i saw a ufo. i dismissed it pretty quick and didn't think anything else about it till i got a text from a buddy of mine back home who loves ufo stuff and actually texted me at 1:00am in the morning to ask me if i noticed anything strange (ufo wise) around 10:00 last night out here on campus, then i remembered what i saw. for whatever it's worth ( and i've never been much of believer in this stuff), but for coincidence sake... i will tell you what i saw looked like it was about ~ 2 to 3 football fields in distance northwest from the intersection of hwy 9 at chautauqua in norman around 10:15-:20 ish wed nt 4/25 in norman ok, and looked a large...Almost "pinkish star (huge star) about ~200 to 400ft above the ground that just seemed to disappear, although i never saw it "disappear", i just noticed it was there one second and gone prety quick to be an airplane.
content.summary: In responce to ufo over ou campus, i did see a strange light,  very bright, no sound, near campus.

content.detailedDescription:
4/24/2012 8:44pm

my friend and i was out fishing at big creek near des moines, iowa, we had just got set up and was sitting there talking and waiting for a bite. it was just a few minutes before the sun went down completly for the day, and then i seen something out of the corner of my eye. i turned and looked toward the object and i was completly amazed at what i was seeing. i turned to my friend and said do you see that. he said "woooow what is that!" it was a glowing orb coming towards us. it was going behind the treeline right behind us, so we got up and ran up the bank and the hill right behind us that featured all the trees. then i told my friend to get his smartphone out and get this on video, he did just that. as he finished his first video we then seen another orb following the first. i looked at one the orbs through the canopy of the trees and it seemed like it just stopped or paused in mid air for just a brief moment. then it seemed like it was at the speed it was going at like it never stopped at all, meaning it didn't seem to excelerate to get back up to crusing speed. it just went back to that speed. really really strange!!! then the same one just went black and i could see its shape becuase it wasn't quite dark just yet. it was circular just like it was when it was emmiting light. it was getting harder to follow through the woods, so i quit chasing it. i had seen enough. i knew i was seeing something that i had never seen before in my entire life. i'm outside at night a lot because i love to fish for catfish, which are more active at night. i've seen plenty of stuff in the night skies such as planes headlights, satellites, metorites, but nothing like this my whole life. i'm a star gazer so i've seen the sky alot and know it pretty well. i should also mention that my compass on my truck  didn't work at all when we left the lake. until the next day when i was driving to work it just came back on. all it would read was c, which i had never seen before and i've had this truck since 2005. what happened to north, south, east, and west.
content.summary: Friend and i was fishing and then seen a glowing orb moving a cross the ski. then we another right behind it.

content.detailedDescription: I was at bishops landing apts. in norman, ok, which is directly behind the ou football stadium. it was around ten o clock, and two of my friends and i were having a cigarette outside their front door. this was on the second story of a three story apartment complex, and our view of the sky is quite limited due to an apartment wall in front of us. my friend haley was the first to point it out, she later told me that she had been watching it for a few seconds already before bringing attention to it. the other friend of mine, ryan, and i both immediately saw the object once we looked up. it was no more than 75 feet above the roof of the building, not quite directly over our heads but instead at about 80 degrees above the horizon. i only watched it for about ten seconds before was out of my line of sight, but i got a decent look. there were no lights on the object at all, but being so close i could easily make out an outline. it was somewhat boomerang shaped, but a bit thicker in the middle. i could also make out circles on the underside of the craft, probably the where the lights would be if they were turned on. i would guess it to be about 25 feet long, and since i was only able to see the underside of the craft i cant give much detail about the dimensions other than that. it was also moving at a rapid rate of speed, probably a couple hundred miles an hour, but being so low in the sky it looked like it was moving very fast. when i fist saw it, it came at us from sw headed ne. but it made a turn (this was immediately after i looked at it) toward the north and continued that direction. it also made absolutely no noise. there was no noise interference around us at all, the place was dead silent. if there was even a slight hum coming from this object, we would have heard it. i made this report because this was right in the middle of campus, i am just hoping other people saw this and report it. i have always been interested in this subject, and i consider myself very privileged to have seen this. there is no doubt in my mind my friends and i saw something extraordinary tonight. one last weird thing, not even a minute after we lost sight of the craft my car alarm started going off. i am sure its unrelated, but by then we all were getting the chills. thank you for reading, and everyone keep your eyes on the sky
content.summary: Ufo over ou campus april 25

content.detailedDescription: April 25, 2012 i was at bishops landing apts. in norman, ok, which is directly behind the ou football stadium. it was around ten o clock, and two of my friends and i were having a cigarette outside their front door. this was on the second story of a three story apartment complex, and our view of the sky is quite limited due to an apartment wall in front of us. my friend haley was the first to point it out, she later told me that she had been watching it for a few seconds already before bringing attention to it. the other friend of mine, ryan, and i both immediately saw the object once we looked up. it was no more than 75 feet above the roof of the building, not quite directly over our heads but instead at about 80 degrees above the horizon. i only watched it for about ten seconds before was out of my line of sight, but i got a decent look. there were no lights on the object at all, but being so close i could easily make out an outline. it was somewhat boomerang shaped, but a bit thicker in the middle. i could also make out circles on the underside of the craft, probably the where the lights would be if they were turned on. i would guess it to be about 25 feet long, and since i was only able to see the underside of the craft i cant give much detail about the dimensions other than that. it was also moving at a rapid rate of speed, probably a couple hundred miles an hour, but being so low in the sky it looked like it was moving very fast. when i fist saw it, it came at us from sw headed ne. but it made a sharp turn (this was immediately after i looked at it) toward the north and continued that direction. it also made absolutely no noise. there was no noise interference around us at all, the place was dead silent. if there was even a slight hum coming from this object, we would have heard it. i made this report because this was right on campus, this is a very busy area. i am keeping my fingers crossed that other people saw this. i have always been interested in this subject, and i feel incredibly lucky and privileged to have witnessed something like this. there is no doubt in my mind i saw something extraordinary tonight. keep your eyes on the sky everyone
content.summary: Ufo with no lights passes over ou campus

content.detailedDescription:
I was called outside my storefront by my partner. we watched the multicolored orb (predominantly magenta but also changing varied colors) in the sky for several minutes. it was in the afternoon, and several people were out, but none other observing what i perceived as a very apparent spectacle. we figured if it was close to us (within 1/2 mile)it must be about the size of a small highschool football field...But if it was closer to the mountains behind it (about 5 miles away), than it was massive. we couldn't discern the distance. 
something descended from it, the color of white liquid light, then faded out. my partner said he saw a gold like emission spark on the right side i believe, then we both saw it shoot off to the left behind or into the mountains. if it was close to us it was super fast getting to those mountains 5 miles away...Like in a second. if it was close to the mountains, it was fast also, but like i already mentioned, would have to have been huge.
i didn't have ominous feelings about the object...Just curiosity. we met one other person about a month later that also saw it, as she described almost exactly what we viewed.
content.summary: Orb in sky with teardrop like object descend from it

content.detailedDescription: Was at home on night of 4/25/2012 when we heard a loud roaring noise and looked up and saw a large hazy glowing and flat rectangular shaped object going at a very high rate of speed go directly over the house north west bound and then make sharp turns side to side then veer left before dissapearing over the trees.  my initial feeling was that it was not a helicopter or airplane which i frequently see on a daily/nightly baisis here.  never have seen somthing like this before.
content.summary: Heard loud roaring noise and looked up and saw object going at a very high rate of speed go directly over house north west bound and then make sharp turns side to side then veer left before dissapearing over the trees.

content.detailedDescription: Was at concordia university chicago track & field in river forest, looked to the south and saw a commercial jet liner in the distance, moving from left to right.  it was fairly high above the heavy tree line.  behind and below it - quite far below it - there appeared to be a very large, fuzzy, gray rectangular object, much larger (closer, perhaps) than the jet.  the rectangle was longer than tall, but not by much... in other words, an elongated square shape.  this is a common flight path for planes from o'hare.  i thought at first it was a very large banner being pulled by a plane, since it moved at approximately the same speed and in the same direction as the jet.  however, what caught my attention was that it was so much farther below the jet (and jetliners do not pull advertisement banners), and it was not a long thin clearly-read banner, but a large, gray, indistinctly-edged rectangle.  as i watched, it began to angle down into the tree line, so i jogged so i could keep it in view and yelled at others to check it out.  nobody saw it and gave me a hard time afterwards.  as it moved towards the horizon, which was the tall tree-filled neighborhood, it appeared that perhaps there were two objects, more like two 'cigars' or saucers that overlapped, and moved independently, one rising above the other momentarily and showing a cylindrical rounded end, then dipping back into or behind the other... almost like two cylindrical objects that blended together in appearance to make a rough rectangular overall shape.  it disappeared below the treeline and that was the last i saw.  it appeared much bigger than the plane, but it could have been much closer.  i had time to think that perhaps it was a flock of geese or sandhill cranes; i'm a birder and pay close attention to things like that.  however, the shape - while changing in nature - was too solid to be a flock of birds, and there was no fluttering or flapping of wings.  it just moved steadily from left to right as i faced south, perhaps south east to northwest towards o'hare, and was gone.  searched news about sightings in chicago but appears nobody has reported it.  my feelings?  was busy, the people i was working with laughed it off, so i got back to work and didn't think about it until i got home tonight.  no time to pull my blackberry out and film.
content.summary: Large gray rectangular shape moving se to nw, changed shapes

content.detailedDescription: Driving home tonight (4-25-12) from savannah, ga to augusta. we were past statesboro heading towards waynesboro in us 25 north. head of us we saw 3 lights (above the tree line) all in the straight row up in the night sky. they were bright yellow and glowing. it appeared like a jet coming into a landing. one light, then 2 lights and 3 lights. all lining up in a row. there are no airports out here. cotton fields and dark. then one light shot off, 2nd cirlced around and took off and the 3rd one disappeared. i laughed and told my son i bet those were ufo's. we came home and searched internet and noticed others have seen "weird lights" in the same location.
content.summary: 3 bright yellowish lights appear in night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was with my bf outside saying good bye to him then i saw green it was like a shooting star but green so i freaked out, i told my boyfriend to turn around and see it but by the time he turned around it had dissapeared  into thin air
content.summary: Happened fast,just shot through the sky and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Just got home, saw a bright red object in the sky, it had me baffled. i stood outside and looked at it for 5 whole long minutes, trying to figure out what it was, no way it was an airplane because it had no green nav light and i picked 4 points in the sky to see if it was moving in any direction and it wasn't. i thought it was mars that just happened to be really big tonight, it was so bright and orangish/red and it was just up in the air there so hard to miss, so i went inside to grab my android phone with google sky maps on it turned it on and pointed it in the direction i saw it from my room, and nothing was listed, so i went back outside and it was totally gone. no noise, no sound, no light path or tail on the object, i just thought it was a really big bright star. apparently it wasn't.
content.summary: Bright red object, thought it was mars, very big looking star

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend went out to the garage (garage not attatched to house) for a smoke, after our smokes we left the garage. i was the first out of the garage, when my friend came out off the garage he turned to lock the padlock on the door. i turned towards him while i waited (he was haveing trouble with the lock, it was dark and the lock takes a bit of effort in general), i always like to look at the clowds and night sky so i looked up, no bright lights or noise made me look up, i was facing north, it took me a few seconds to notice the three dim, red-orange lights in a triangle moving in a straight path across the sky east to west (maybe se to nw if so, only slightly). it probably would have been flying over trees, and/or river, and/or over a bridge or power lines so theres no way it was being towed by something from the ground. it was very hard to tell how far away it was, if it was close it made no noise, if it was at a high altitude it was very large (im leaning closer towards close,small, and noiseless, if thats the case id have to guess i was under a kilometer away horizontally). it was a clear night with no clouds, i could see there was a body of some sort because it coverd stars as it passed them. it looked very much like this image i found on the internet (did google image search) [link removed/cms/tg] 
but the lights i saw were dimmer and more red. it travled at a costant and quite fast pace, at least a kilometer in under 20 seconds.

we do have a small airport north east of the city (our only airport, we are a small city roughly 35,000 people). but i havve seen many planes in the sky at night landing and taking off from the airport at night. the apparent alltitude and angle i saw the ufo travling relative the the airport just doesnt add up if someone were to say it was just air traffic.

im pretty much a sceptic when it comes to videos and images of ufos (lol look at what hollywood can do), but this is, as far as im concerned undeniable. i didnt get to see it for an extended time but, its nothing i have ever seen before (first hand). my friend who was locking the door got a brief look at it before it faded from sight, he says he thinks it was a bird (a bird in the middle of the night that glows, f**k that!!) so i do have another witness but hes dumb.
content.summary: Triangle or chevron shaped, three dim red-orange lights on coners, no noise, straight flight path e to w, visable 10-15 sec

content.detailedDescription: hello mufon. about fifteen years ago i put in a vcr tape of the movie "high noon" staring gary cooper. in the first minute or two of the movie during the credits, an apparent ufo flew right over top of the camera and over top of three horse riders. just as the riders turned left to cross railroad tracks the ufo flew over the riders and turned right without appearing to slow down. the object seems to be elongated as it flies overhead, but after it caught my eye i hit the pause button frame by frame until it does a 90 degree turn to the right. at first it appears black obviously because the sun is above. as it turns right it clearly looks like a classic silver disc, but not the plate on plate kind, but the kind taped in abundance in mexico. the sun is apparently behind the camera which is the reason it doesn't appear silver until it turns, and takes sunlight broadside. as it flies overhead you can see a wavy disturbance around the object. i have since researched the making of the movie, and i found out that the movie was done on a tight budget, therefore it was likely that the insignificance of the scene would not warrant a retake. this is no prank, and i hope you have the time to investigate this film and email me as to your conclusions. also, the cinematogrophy is supurb in this film, so the video is top quality black and white. many of my friends have viewed this sequence in the movie and think i should tell someone like you.  happy hunting. sincerely, a great advocate of your valuable research.   john brite
content.summary: This is a ufo caught on film in the 1952 movie "high noon"

content.detailedDescription: This lasted about 20 seconds.Was at the computer and looked out the window---still daylight and saw two reflective objects going from north to south east at a rapid pace.Then they stopped and one at a timeshot upward and i lost them.Full day light at the time and i have never seen anything like this before.I couldnt give you a distance because i dont know the size of the---what ever it was.These objects took a 90 degree turn straight up and were gone.Add me to the list of crazys.
content.summary: Two reflective lights in the afternoon sun at a very high speed ,turning 90 degrees and out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
On april 25th 2012, i was walking my son on ring drive with one of my dogs, my son has a thing for aircraft and pointed out these two objects in the distance. at first glance i realized that these were not fixed wing aircraft; the two objects were following each other too closely and in tandem with each other. so, i whipped out my camera and was able to video both objects, unfortunately i only have a few seconds of far less than ideal video because the objects started performing odd manoeuvres and zipped off before i could get to a different vantage point. plus, i was pushing my son across the street in his carriage and with a chihuahua in tow.

of what i could see prior to video taping and during the taping was two flattened disc like objects that were very bright, they would move vertically up and down quickly, but with syncronisity to one another. once i tried to stop video taping in order to gain a better perspective, but, both objects moved at an upward angle with a very fast rate of climb, interestingly enough neither object tilted during the high rate of climb. 

i guess my feelings are that we are not alone in this universe, i've been living in groton ct for a few years. and yes we live near an airport, but in no way, shape or form was this a conventional aircraft. we see dozens of planes that fly by our house and this looked nothing like any of them. i believe this is a ufo hotspot and have been taking notice for quite some time now; recently, i've been packing my video camera along for my walks with my son because of all the activity that i noticed. i think that some of the supporting factors for the high activity are related to the fact that the groton nuclear sub base, general dynamics (electric boat), and the military installation (national guard - located next to the groton airport)are all located here. i'm sure it can be said that historically groton ct isn't a ufo "hot spot", i can't argue with the facts; however, it is my personal belief that at this present time, it could be, and maybe someone will read this and start observing the skies whenever they are in this town.

on a side note, it would seem that these objects have some sort of curiosity regarding us, and, after a bit of research i found that technology and nuclear weapons seem to invoke a curiosity or affinity on behalf of these ufo's or dare i say: extraterrestrial beings. as i said, i have a video of this instance as well as a few pictures and videos from the last month or so regarding different instances.

thank you for reading my experience.
content.summary: I was walking my son and noticed 2 flattened disc like objects maneuvering in a strange way.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 9pm on april 13, i was in a grocery store parking lot putting my groceries in the car. i saw some lights that at first appeared to be airplane lights, blinking in the sky (red and white lights). i just saw those lights for a few seconds, and assumed it was an airplane, although i thought that it was moving slower than an airplane. when i looked up again to take another look, the lights were gone. (i'm still not sure whether this was part of my sighting experience or not; it's possible that this was an airplane.)

a few minutes later i was at home, unloading my groceries. i made a few trips between my car and the house, and closed the house door each time, to keep the mosquitoes out. when i opened the house door to go back out to the car, i was confronted by some lights in the sky, directly in front of me. i felt frozen in place while i stared at it, trying to comprehend what it was. it looked like a disc shaped object, with three lights that covered most of the surface. the object appeared to be black; i saw a black outline at the outer edge of the lights. the object appeared to be really close and low in the sky; the size appeared about 2-4 inches in width (like thumb and first finger held apart at arm's length). the lights were incredibly bright, it's hard for me to describe the vivid quality they had. the light in the center was taller, oblong shaped, and a deep red. this light gave me a really frightened feeling. the  other two lights extended off to the sides: a vivid bright blue on the left, and a white-ish blue on the right. these lights were so brilliant and vivid, but didn't appear to be shining onto the treetops. i only stared at it for less than 10 seconds (i think), while i tried to figure out what it was. it was completely motionless, and made no noise. finally i realized it wasn't an airplane or helicopter, and i had a strong overwhelming feeling that it was watching me (the lights were pointed directly at me). i got extremely scared, said "oh sh*t" out loud, and closed and locked the door. i went to get my husband, who was in our room at the other end of the house. i told him i'd seen something, and when he got there i opened the door just to peek outside, but it was gone. my husband went outside to look, and stayed outside for about 5 minutes, but he didn't see anything. he did see an airplane, which is normal since we're in the flight path for the rdu airport. 

this experience really scared me, because i don't know what it was, but i think that it was watching me and wanted me to see it. that really frightens me; i honestly just don't know what to think. the sky around our house is almost completely obscured by tall trees, except for one spot where there's a break in the trees next to our neighbor's house. this object was in the only spot where i would be able to see it in the sky, from the house. i almost wish that i'd taken a picture of it or watched it longer, but at the time that didn't even occur to me; i was just really frightened and wanted to get away from it as soon as possible.

nothing unusual has happened since then, although i've had dreams about seeing ufo's (objects and lights in the sky) several times since then. i'm also kind of scared to be outside at night, because i don't want to see something like this ever again. i wasn't sure whether to report this or not; i almost didn't want to, because i just didn't want to write about this or think about it. but i've been looking at the ufo reports on this webpage to see if there were any other sightings near here, and i saw one from last night (24th) in cary that sounded similar, so i figured i'd report this in case anyone else in the raleigh area has seen something like this.
content.summary: Witnessed three extremely bright lights in the sky, stationary and no noise

content.detailedDescription:
Flight path approx 70,000ft using gen 2 night vision monocular. saw 3 start like objects in succession travel at high rate of speed. if you have seen the recent video clip of the military scram jet test in the pacific that broke apart at mach 20. i would compare the speed to that except somewhat faster. it was straight and level from west to east. using nvg as you know reveals everything in a green hue. these 3 lights were dim compared to the brighter star surroundings. once it passed over the eglin afb airspace i got a better backdrop of stars and starlight at which point (only for a brief second) all 3 lights appeared to belong to a very large cigar like object. it flew so fast and straight and level it was an awesome sight. i usually do not report anything like this but this was super awesome!
plus, i know the (powers that be) monitor these sites and read everything carefully, so i just want to say that if it is us (military space craft). keep up the good work. if you guys fly around in those things, it really looks fun. i know our military has to have craft that perform these types of things and you guys are just really, really lucky to be involved in the development, testing and implementation of that type of technology. what a fun job you must have. i am from the school that secrets are secret for a reason and john q public does not need to fear the military, but needs to make sure that we have really good medical care if anyone gets hurt.
anyways, thank you for listening.

p.S. - if you ever have an available seat, i would love to be flight crew for the day. i mean night that is!
content.summary: 3 start like objects in succession until horizen star backdrop, appeared cigar shape briefly.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 2am, tuesday night 4/24/2012. me, my friend and her boyfriend were on their front porch which is a second story porch, having a smoke. i sat down in a chair and just happened to look up at the sky. i was looking at a star, it was a very bright star so my eyes went right to it. but i also noticed right away below it and a little to the right, was what i thought was another star. but this star was a little smaller and it was twinkling. i felt my heart rate pick up speed a little bit, because i noticed that the twinkling i was seeing was actually lights. i pointed this out to my friends and they noticed it also. at this point we established that this was not a star. it appeared to be round, and it looked like the light would start out on one side, like the right side, then go to the middle, then move to the left. this pattern continued thru out this sighting. sometimes the lights would be a bluish- white color, we saw green a few times, and on occasion red. this object slowly and in a zig zag motion moved to the right a few inches. it was now no longer next to the star it was originally under but between two large trees. it was sort of hovering in one spot, but then it would slightly move up a little bit, then come back down. then it would go to the left slightly then back to the right. we watched it do this continuous moving for 30 minutes straight with out taking our eyes off of it. there was one point when we saw it disappear, we aren't sure if it was just behind a cloud, because eventually it did get extremely cloudy, or if it actually went away somewhere. it vanished for about 5 seconds and then it came right back into sight. by this point it has moved a little bit further over to the right. so instead of being between the two trees, its now on the right side of the right tree towards the top. it continued to hover there for several more minutes before it vanished again. the sky got extremely cloudy and we could no longer see the object. we thought at first it was a plane, but ive seen many  plaines in the sky and that was no air plane...


this started at 2 am in the morning and continued for about an hour or so. so technically the date was 4/25. seeing how it was after midnight.
content.summary: Star like object in sky with pulsating lights, changing from white, to green and red. hovering in one spot for about 30 minutes before moving sideways to the right.

content.detailedDescription: I had walked outside to have a cigarette and i was looking towards burbank airport,watching the planes come in when i noticed a dark object that appeared to be floating at first i thought it was a mylar balloon it looked like it was tumbling up especially when it looked like it was reflecting sun light off the top, later i realized they were lights,anyway it climbed for about two minutes then it seamed to start drifting towards me. at that point i thought well maybe it's a helicopter, but i didn't here any noise i thought that was weird because as i watched it getting closer i started thinking well maybe it's an airplane,but still no noise then it came almost overhead and stopped also as it was approaching it appeared to be chanching shapes it looked a little jagged around the edges it also looked as if it were shrouded in mist. i also noticed lights flashing and there was a vortex way below it. at this point iam starting to think maybe this is a ufo so i am thinking i should run and get my camera, but i don't want to miss anything. i finally dash in side grab my camera come back and it's still there so snapped a few shots then i decided to get a better shot from a different angle i stepped around the patio cover and it was gone just like that in an instant. i remember feeling as if it were trying to communicate i felt like i was being watched then it started feeling a little scary afterwards i thought wow amazing this feels like a dream unbelievable at that point i felt like go ahead take me i'll go what an opportunity chance of a lifetime. iam now working on electromagnetic flying craft. i was that inspired because this is my second one the first one i didnt have a camera available. that was a whole different experience especially at night. this experience was like winning the lotto.
content.summary: It was the most incredible experience better than my first about 30 years ago i always felt and knew we were not alone

content.detailedDescription: I had walked outside to have a cigarette and i was looking towards burbank airport,watching the planes come in when i noticed a dark object that appeared to be floating at first i thought it was a mylar balloon it looked like it was tumbling up especially when it looked like it was reflecting sun light off the top, later i realized they were lights,anyway it climbed for about two minutes then it seamed to start drifting towards me. at that point i thought well maybe it's a helicopter, but i didn't here any noise i thought that was weird because as i watched it getting closer i started thinking well maybe it's an airplane,but still no noise then it came almost overhead and stopped also as it was approaching it appeared to be chanching shapes it looked a little jagged around the edges it also looked as if it were shrouded in mist. i also noticed lights flashing and there was a vortex way below it. at this point iam starting to think maybe this is a ufo so i am thinking i should run and get my camera, but i don't want to miss anything. i finally dash in side grab my camera come back and it's still there so snapped a few shots then i decided to get a better shot from a different angle i stepped around the patio cover and it was gone just like that in an instant. i remember feeling as if it were trying to communicate i felt like i was being watched then it started feeling a little scary afterwards i thought wow amazing this feels like a dream unbelievable at that point i felt like go ahead take me i'll go what an opportunity chance of a lifetime. iam now working on electromagnetic flying craft. i was that inspired because this is my second one the first one i didnt have a camera available. that was a whole different experience especially at night. this experience was like winning the lotto.
content.summary: It was the most incredible experience better than my first about 30 years ago i always felt and knew we were not alone

content.detailedDescription: I was up at 5:45 am looking out my slidding glass door faces sw. saw a starlike object going moderate speed then slow down, stop and just vanish.Lasted about 1 minute. at first i thought it may be a satellite. knowing a satellite cant do what it did. i thought maybe i have seen something unknown.
content.summary: Starlike object moving sw slowed down stopped then disappearedii

content.detailedDescription: Observed a semi-circle of lights that remained fixed in relation to each other over a ridge in california foothills.  lights seemed to change color from white to red to green.  observed for 10 mins.  not there the next night.
content.summary: Semi-circle of lights - changed colors

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my ex-girlfriend were headed to l.A from texas on i-10 somewhere between (
new mexico and arizona, what looked like a comit or big shooting star shot across 
the sky in front of us while i was driving, from left to right, at that time my radar detector sounded off as if we were passing a cop with his radar gun on, you know how the beeps start slowly and as you get closer to the cop th
e beeps start beeping closer together, well the second we saw the the light the radar went off and it left a trail of light in the sky at a 90 degree angle and the was gone. we were very energetic and excited after we saw that.
content.summary: Comit, 90 dgree angle in sky, tracer of light, radar detector sounded rapid

content.detailedDescription: About 10 o'clock last night my husband and i were sitting on the front porch of our home when i noticed an extremely bright light going across the sky.  i pointed it out to my husband who noted that the object did not have any traditional flight lighting (red or green blinking lights).  the brightness of the object dimmed dramatically and continued on its path (south to north).  after continuing for a few more seconds, the object turned abruptly and shot off in a perpendicular direction (east) and was no longer seen.  shortly after a plane flew over in the opposite direction of the objects original path. it seems as though the object had seen the plane, dimmed and then shot off.
content.summary: Bright ufo dims before changing path and shooting off.

content.detailedDescription: Around 2200 on 4/24/12 i was in the back yard facing west i noticed a commercial aircraft heading north with its landing lights on as we are near dfw airport and have several flight paths for dfw and love field. i then noticed 2 aircraft at a higher altitude heading north northwest. they appeared to be military as the aircraft were in very close proximity to each other and one overtook the other. i then noticed several more of the same type of aircraft, they had the same distance from wingtip to wingtip and had strobes and beacons on, some were on a straight line path while others banked and turned and appeared to have no designated flight plans and none of the aircraft created a contrail. a total of eight of these aircraft were initially observed. i then noticed an object starting about 70 degrees fly directly overhead at 90 degrees. at first glance i thought it may be a flock of geese, as it was in a v formation, when i looked closer it appeared to be in a boomerang shape and a type of fog enveloped the object but was not traveling fast enough to create a wilson cloud. approximate altitude was hard to judge but i would say 500-1000ft and speed was around 150-200mph there were no lights on the object it was completely silent and was only lit by ambient light. as it headed off into a northerly direction it appeared to fade out. subsequent to this sighting there were more of the military aircraft in the area and no more commercial aviation seen in the area for over an hour.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped cloud object over north texas

content.detailedDescription: A very large military jet flew ssw, from west bound i30 when these 2 oval balloon like objects, almost translucent, trailed far behind in the same direction but somewhat lower but ascending. i ran to fetch a pair of large binoculars but they had vanished! in this same area a few few years prior, above one of the communication towers a similar orb dotted and darted just above this tower. recently i've noticed that this particular tower has been downgraded. lights have been removed. many planes fly over the area, but this was about 11:00am on a bright and sunny day. i asked a couple of people to view right above the tower looking up into the stratosphere as far as possible, and they confirmed the object. suddenly it vanished!
content.summary: While standing on the dock of my work place, viewing contrails of a large military jet, these two objects seemed to follow!

content.detailedDescription:
It was 8:04 pm on easter sunday (8 april 12) and i was walking with my dog back to my house. the was lowering in the sky behind us, but it was still pretty bright out. i noticed the bright orange light which was similar in apparent size and slightly brighter than venus. however, i noticed it was in the wrong part of the sky to be venus (i was facing east). also, i noticed the object was moving from right to left (south to north). at first i assumed it was an airliner, but it appeared way too bright and didn't have any navigation (red/green) lights or anti collision (strobe) lights. it flew in that level path, never changing altitude. it took about 30-40 seconds for it to cover my field of view, going right to left. i took the dog in the house and then immediately went to the back yard to see if i could see it again. it was still following on the same path, until it started to fade away. it took about two full seconds for it to fade away (think dimmer switch). 

i live next to the local airport and there is a military air field here too (air force). i thought it also might be one of the jets in after burner, but the jets only use after burn when departing and terminate the after pretty shortly after takeoff. also, jets rarely fly on sundays unless they are returning from a weekend cross country sortie. there were no scheduled sorties for that day or time and none of the arrivals into the airfield call for the aircraft to fly a south to north path north of the airfield like the flight path of the object i saw.

i've lived here nearly three years and haven't seen anything like that before and i haven't seen anything since.
content.summary: Orange orb/light heading n/nw before fading out

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mother were outside looking at all of the airplanes then a huge ufo hovers over our house that's in shape of a boomerang but was not showing any light but left a path.Only got a 10 second glare of it and then it disappeared in to the sky then when my sister was on her way home her car lost fuel in front of her friends house and they turned around and saw it and went straight inside her house.
content.summary: Ufo flew over top of house, silent,make car break down

content.detailedDescription:
in buford georgia. on april 24th, 2012. i saw my first ufo. the time was about 10pm est.  i was sitting on the front deck of the house with two of my friends. the house faces north. i had my back to the house, facing my two friends and they were facing me. my view of the sky is clear with no tree obstructions except the one story houses across the street. i noticed a light in the sky, from my peripheral vision.
 it was  at about my 11 o'clock direction. at about 45 degrees off the horizon. i immediately thought it was a meteor. i looked up, it was white, as if it was glowing, it did not pulsate. it was solid looking, oval shaped, and it had no tail. it was traveling south, southwest. 
it passed to my 9 o'clock  still at 45 degrees, then it changed direction.
it looked to go in a more downward fall, like it was going toward the ground but since it was high off the ground, i thought it might just be turning in a more west direction.  at this time, its location off the horizon was dropping and it now was heading toward the tree line next to our house, on my left. i wasn't going to say anything to my friends but it did not disappear right away like a typical meteor. i stood up and shouted 
"it's still going!" as my two friends looked up, the ufo zig zagged many 
times like /\/\/\/\/\/\ as it was going, from my view, into the tree line, but not crashing into the trees, it was still high in the sky. i could see through the first of three trees that made the tree line.
then it disappeared behind the thicker trees and the neighbors house. my friends never saw it. it all took place within a matter of three seconds.
i don't claim it to be any aliens from another planet. for all i know, it could have been the latest us air force, top secret, air craft or space craft. i know what i saw and it was cool. it was silent, white in color, oval shaped, it had no tail like the meteors do when burning up in the atmosphere, and it changed direction many times.

           i have heard of many peoples stories of ufo's all throughout my life and its cool to finally see one of my very own sightings. remember, i don't claim it to be any e.T.'s. i don't know what it was, but i do know it was no light show, it was no bird, no jet, no airplane, no air balloon, no kite, no glider. at this time, it is unknown to my knowledge.
content.summary: Oval white object  with no tail moving ssw, changed direction to west then zig zagged behind the tree line, super fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my deck around 11:30 p.M. to have a cigarette. it was a clear night and a lot of stars were out. i noticed this twinkleing and thought ...That was a bright star.  i came in the house and got my binoculars and realized that it wasn't a star because of the red lights so i figured seeing that we are close to an airport that it must be a plane.  i sat down and just watched it and after 10 minutes it still didn't move. so i looked thru the binoculars again.  the object seemed to be jerking almost like doing little circles?? this object stayed for about 45 minutes. it never went away it just seemed to go farther away up and then just disappeared.My wife did take some pictures which i have included for  you. it was really freaky.  
like i said this might have been a plane and i wouldn't have even filled this form out but my wife did see something about 5 months ago.  
she said she was sitting outside late one night and saw these red lights and to her it looked like 2 planes piggy backing and they moved really slow right over our apartment building.  i didn't think anything about it until i realized planes never fly over our building.  like i said we live by the raleigh airport and we see the flight pattern of the planes all day long...The ones that went over our building just never ever happen.
if you want the pics she took this evening, let me know where to send them.  you have much better equipment and i am sure you could probably tell if this is a plane or not.  thanks for your time.

jon
content.summary: Just these lights of red and white and this object stayed in 1 place for 40 mins. i do have pictures. it may be a plane however, i never saw a plane stay stationary like that before?

content.detailedDescription: driving down hwy 53 in watkinsville going west toward hwy 78 we noticed a bright multi colored pulsating light we pulled over to get a picture and noticed 1 more appeared. i took a couple more pics then we tried to relocate due to street lights obstructing our view.We searched but they were gone. upon review i see a third cigar object, which i thought was a cloud,apparently it is something worth looking at i will send these new pics asap
content.summary: Saw 1 stationary pulsating multi colored object then was joined by another i took a couple photos and during the review i noticed a 3rd disc shaped object
